definitions: To strike the palms of (one's hands) together repeatedly, typically in order to applaud or to attract attention.
To strike (something) with the palm of one's hand.
To put or place (something) somewhere quickly and suddenly.
To make a sudden, sharp noise, especially of thunder.
examples: The audience began to clap loudly.
She clapped him on the shoulder.
He clapped a hand over her mouth.
